LanguageData.stopSongDesc: Stop custom Song and Recover Orignal Song List
LanguageData.WallAttachment_WarningNeedWall: Must be placed over a wall.
LanguageData.WallAttachment_WarningBlocked: Must be facing a passable tile.
LanguageData.WallAttachment_Both: Must be placed over a wall, facing a passable tile.
LanguageData.DoorAttachment_WarningNeedWall: Must be placed over a wall.
LanguageData.DoorAttachment_WarningBlocked: Must be facing a passable tile.
LanguageData.DoorAttachment_Both: Must be placed over a wall, facing a passable tile.
LanguageData.PassableObject_CantPass: Must be placed on Passable object
